project.name: Frank!Framework parent
project.description: The Frank!Framework is an easy-to-use, stateless integration framework which allows (transactional) messages to be modified and exchanged between different systems.

bannedDependencies.message: Prevent the use of both javax and jakarta packages
Don't use geronimo anymore, ensure javax namespace is used
Prevent the use of STAX1, use STAX 2 (org.codehaus.woodstox:stax2-api) instead!
Don't touch versions, we should use jakarta.activation-api:2.1.3
use the newer 'org.bouncycastle:*-jdk18on' version of org.bouncycastle
Don't use com.sun but glassfish instead
These dependencies should be provided by the Application Server!
